Embracing failure as a part of the journey towards success is a healthy perspective that encourages learning and growth. What is a prominent characteristic of the fictional world of Zephyria?

A prominent characteristic of the fictional world of Zephyria, as you described earlier, is that magic is abundant and used in everyday life. This magical aspect permeates various elements of Zephyrian society, from the ability of its inhabitants to shape-shift into different animals at will, to the existence of the Great Library of Zephyria, which houses the largest collection of magical texts in the world. The use of magic is also highlighted in cultural practices such as the national sport, Elemental Championship, and the renowned Zephyrian Symphony Orchestra, which uses enchanted instruments. Additionally, the governance of the Zephyrian government by a High Council composed of representatives from different magical guilds further underscores the centrality of magic to Zephyrian life.
